function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Relying heavily on tourism revenues for financing conservation and support for local communities.","Impact":"Vulnerability to economic downturns and fluctuations in tourism activity, which can affect conservation efforts and community support.","Mitigation":"Diversifying funding sources, implementing sustainable financial strategies, and creating alternative revenue streams beyond tourism.","Technologies":"Financial management and forecasting tools, sustainable business practices, and community development programs.","People":"PCAs governed by private actors, Indigenous peoples, local communities","Owner":"Governments, NGOs, and non-state PCA governance organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of retention of fees for reinvestment in PCAs due to structural changes in international and domestic source markets.","Impact":"Reduction in funding for PCAs, leading to decreased autonomy, limited resources for conservation efforts, and potential negative impact on biodiversity and ecosystem services.","Mitigation":"Developing adaptable funding models, creating partnerships for resource pooling, and establishing long-term sustainability plans for PCAs.","Technologies":"Financial management systems, partnership platforms, and impact assessment tools.","People":"Management boards of PCAs, operators, different types of visitors","Owner":"PCAs, tourism operators, and government entities"},{"Description":"Dependency on cross-subsidization arrangements to support PCAs with limited revenue earning potential.","Impact":"Risk of underfunding for PCAs with limited revenue earning potential, which can impede conservation activities and ecosystem preservation in those areas.","Mitigation":"Developing alternative financial support mechanisms, creating targeted funding programs for PCAs with limited revenue, and advocating for inclusive conservation policies.","Technologies":"Financial modeling tools, targeted funding platforms, and policy advocacy frameworks.","People":"PCAs with limited revenue earning potential, conservation organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, conservation organizations, and sustainable development initiatives"}]}
